Scope and Contents
The Perley Baldwin Payne collection contains a small diary of kept during his service in the Spanish Civil War as a volunteer with the International Brigades in 1938. Also included are some bullets collected by Payne in Spain.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.
